entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
